item.dc:creator: @Svitkona Svitkona
item.description:

[quote=“drubrkletern, post:20, topic:384569”][quote author=reyx7 link=topic=480332.msg3516470#msg3516470 date=1299031521]

Rey the x Rey the x Rey the x Rey the x Rey the x Rey the x Rey the x

Do i get cookie?

I just realized i had another record disk in one of my chests from like a month ago rofl.

Cool, I’ll buy it. If it’s on the official server, I give u 5 diamonds. If not, then it’s kinda a waste.
Also, "rey x + rey x + rey x+ rey x + rey x+ rey x+ rey x = reyx7. Where do you think my name came from? Accidentally switching the username and password? Psshhhh…
[/quote]
Yes :o

and about the buying, im good, i have like 80 diamonds. Plus full diamond and 2 d pics and a d sword[/quote]
Which were not found by Xray!
(give me cooky)

item.title: Record disk!
item.dc:creator: @drubrkletern drubrkletern
item.description:
@drubrkletern wrote:

[quote=“reyx7, post:26, topic:384569”][quote author=Cole1497 link=topic=480332.msg3516508#msg3516508 date=1299033128]
^I’m just saying, it seems every time someone finds something rare, they make a thread.
[/quote]

That’s what “Cool story bro” is for. No need to troll.

Troll levels:
Extreme ---- FAGGOTASSBITCH

High ---- umad bro? I eat my own shit at night TROLOLOLOLOLOLOLOLOLO

medium---- Hai guiese!! I got some stuffzz! I amke thred !!!1!!!11!!11!1

low ---- cool story bro.[/quote]
WUT U WERE TROLLIN ME

SHOULDA SED THAT B4 I REOPTED U TO MOEDRATOR USIN TEH BOTUN

Lol but its true, when people get something rare, they get excited, and they want to boast, (inb4 me)

Btw reyx, i fixed your post.

Read full topic
